Package logic

Class BrickBreaker

java.lang.Object
logic.BrickBreaker
public class BrickBreaker extends Object
Main game class
Processes all of the games logic
Returns status of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • BrickBreaker

      public BrickBreaker()
      Default constructor, has constant size for game objects and the playing field

    • BrickBreaker

      public BrickBreaker(Pair fieldSize, Pair platformSize, Pair platformVelocity, Pair brickSize, Pair ballSize, Pair ballVelocity)
      Parameterized constructor
      Parameters:
      fieldSize - size of the playing field
      platformSize - size of the player platform
      platformVelocity - x-velocity of player platform
      brickSize - size of the bricks
      ballSize - size of the ball
      ballVelocity - initial moving ball velocity

  • Method Details

    • getField

      public Field getField()
      Playing field getter
      Returns:
      the playing field (it's just a dimension, width and height)

    • getGameObjects

      public Vector<GameObject> getGameObjects()
      Game objects getter
      Returns:
      all of the game objects in a vector

    • getStatus

      public boolean getStatus()
      Game running status getter
      Returns:
      true if game over conditions are not met, otherwise returns false

    • processInput

      public void processInput(BrickBreaker.Input input)
      Takes user input and if input is valid performs the passed input action
      Parameters:
      input -

    • update

      public void update()
      Update method, updates all of the game objects
